column4: Hello, I want to move to linux but Im not sure my hardware allows that. I have an ATI Radeon 5750 HD card, will I have a lot of trouble getting it to work?
this is what the live CD is for - you can try it without installing
so I will have problems getting hardware accelration working?
just install it as a second OS and test - it will probably be fine - just stick with 10.4 and not 10.10
